string_data: check failed - The article contains a factual inconsistency regarding the criminal damage charge. The text states "Bruce and Parfitt were both arrested and charged with £2,000 in criminal damage" but this phrasing is incorrect - people are not "charged with £2,000" but rather charged with criminal damage that caused £2,000 worth of damage. The correct phrasing would be something like "charged with criminal damage estimated at £2,000" or "charged with causing £2,000 worth of criminal damage."
